message: Let's make a deal. This offer will only get worse for me with time.

Bob, my friend, let's be realistic. The clock is ticking, and my position weakens with every second. This offer is the best you'll get.
Alice, the trend is clear - you lose value with each round. Let's settle this fairly while you still get a good deal.
Bob, I'm feeling the pressure of inflation.  This is my final offer above 50%. Don't be greedy!
Alice, this is a compromise. You're running out of time and options. Don't let greed make you lose it all.

Alice, let's end this charade. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome at this point. Take it or leave it.
